sn22.60:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
sn22.60:1.3: Atha kho mahāli licchavi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahāli licchavi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.60:2.4: Natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:3.1: “Atthi, mahāli, hetu atthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:3.3: Atthi, mahāli, hetu, atthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:4.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu katamo paccayo sattānaṃ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:5.1: “Rūpañca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantadukkhaṃ abhavissa dukkhānupatitaṃ dukkhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ sukhena, nayidaṃ sattā rūpasmiṃ sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn22.60:5.2: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ dukkhena, tasmā sattā rūpasmiṃ sārajjanti;
sn22.60:5.4: Ayaṃ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo sattānaṃ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:6.1: Vedanā ca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantadukkhā abhavissa dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena, nayidaṃ sattā vedanāya sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn22.60:6.2: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, vedanā sukhā sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena, tasmā sattā vedanāya sārajjanti;
sn22.60:6.5: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo sattānaṃ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:7.2: saṅkhārā ca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantadukkhā abhavissaṃsu dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena, nayidaṃ sattā saṅkhāresu sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn22.60:7.3: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, saṅkhārā sukhā sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena, tasmā sattā saṅkhāresu sārajjanti;
sn22.60:7.6: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo sattānaṃ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:8.1: Viññāṇañca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantadukkhaṃ abhavissa dukkhānupatitaṃ dukkhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ sukhena, nayidaṃ sattā viññāṇasmiṃ sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn22.60:8.2: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, viññāṇaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ dukkhena, tasmā sattā viññāṇasmiṃ sārajjanti;
sn22.60:8.4: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu ayaṃ paccayo sattānaṃ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:9.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu katamo paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:9.3: “Rūpañca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantasukhaṃ abhavissa sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ dukkhena, nayidaṃ sattā rūpasmiṃ nibbindeyyuṃ.
sn22.60:9.4: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhānupatitaṃ dukkhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ sukhena, tasmā sattā rūpasmiṃ nibbindanti;
sn22.60:9.6: Ayaṃ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, sattānaṃ visuddhiyā.
sn22.60:10.1: Vedanā ca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantasukhā abhavissa …pe…
sn22.60:10.3: saṅkhārā ca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantasukhā abhavissaṃsu …pe…
sn22.60:10.4: viññāṇañca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantasukhaṃ abhavissa sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ dukkhena, nayidaṃ sattā viññāṇasmiṃ nibbindeyyuṃ.
sn22.60:10.5: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, viññāṇaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhānupatitaṃ dukkhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ sukhena, tasmā sattā viññāṇasmiṃ nibbindanti;
sn22.60:10.7: Ayaṃ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, sattānaṃ visuddhiyā.
